main event: An unusually bright ball of fire followed by a whitish smoke trail was observed over Montevideo, Uruguay, on October 13, 1956.
interesting points: The object was reported to have passed over the city multiple times,It left smoke trails that were described as contrails,The sighting was observed by many civilians in the area,There was a concurrent report of aircraft in the vicinity (jets),The Meteorological Service evaluated it as a possible natural phenomenon.
sighted object: a bright ball of fire with a smoke trail
